title: Home
text: This webpage aims to help you navigate you through the forest of R packages that can be used in health economics and signpost you to the most appropriate one, given your intended health economic analysis.

title: About
text:
The HTA hub is designed to provide an inventory of R packages related to health economics. It is aimed at health economists and R developers.
The hub provides an automated listing of relevant packages published on Github, and provides information on code quality.
The hub features a data scraping tool that searches through Github using keywords related to health economic modeling, and renders it on the hub.qmd.
For a curated list of health economics R packages, please visit the getstarted.qmd, last updated August 2024.
This project was started as part of a R-HTA Hackathon held at the University of Belfast on 5th and 6th August 2024.
